paragraphs.text: When Toph sneaked away from the group to visit him at his campsite, Zuko assumed that he was being ambushed, as he was now on the run again after being accused of being a traitor to the Fire Nation. Without thinking, he used firebending to attack and burned her feet, causing her to flee from the camp on all fours. The site was later disassembled after Zuko joined the team, as he was offered a room at the temple.
